   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).

   31:          connect_node/1,

   46: 	 monitor_nodes_errors/1,

   49: 	 monitor_nodes_many/1,
   50:          monitor_nodes_down_up/1,
   51:          dist_ctrl_proc_smoke/1,
   52:          dist_ctrl_proc_reject/1,
   53:          erl_uds_dist_smoke_test/1,
   54:          erl_1424/1, net_kernel_start/1, differing_cookies/1,
   55:          cmdline_setcookie_2/1, connection_cookie/1,
   56:          dyn_differing_cookies/1,
   57:          xdg_cookie/1,
   58:          allowed/1]).
   59: 
   60: %% Performs the test at another node.
   61: -export([get_socket_priorities/0,
   62:          get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option/1,
   63: 	 tick_cli_test/3, tick_cli_test1/3,
   64: 	 tick_serv_test/2, tick_serv_test1/1,
   65: 	 run_remote_test/1,
   66:          dyn_node_name_do/2,
   67:          epmd_reconnect_do/2,
   68: 	 setopts_do/2,
   69:          setopts_deadlock_test/2,
   70: 	 keep_conn/1, time_ping/1,
   71:          ddc_remote_run/2]).
   72: 
   73: -export([net_kernel_start_do_test/1]).
   74: 
   75: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   76: 
   77: -export([dist_cntrlr_output_test_size/2]).

   79: -export([pinger/1]).

   81: -export([start_uds_rpc_server/1,
   82:          wait_node_down/1]).
   83: 
   84: -define(DUMMY_NODE,dummy@test01).
   85: -define(ALT_EPMD_PORT, "12321").
   86: -define(ALT_EPMD_CMD, "epmd -port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT).
   87: 
   88: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% The distribution is mainly tested in the big old test_suite.
   90: %% This test only tests the net_ticktime configuration flag.
   91: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   92: %% erl -sname master -rsh ctrsh
   93: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   94: 
   95: suite() ->
   96:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   97:      {timetrap,{minutes,12}}].
   98: 
   99: all() -> 
  100:     [dist_ctrl_proc_smoke,
  101:      dist_ctrl_proc_reject,
  102:      tick, tick_intensity, tick_change, nodenames, hostnames,
  103:      illegal_nodenames, connect_node,
  104:      dyn_node_name,
  105:      epmd_reconnect,
  106:      hidden_node, setopts,
  107:      table_waste, net_setuptime, inet_dist_options_options,
  108:      net_ticker_spawn_options,
  109:      {group, monitor_nodes},
  110:      erl_uds_dist_smoke_test,
  111:      erl_1424, net_kernel_start,
  112:      {group, differing_cookies},
  113:      allowed
  114:      ].
  115: 
  116: groups() -> 
  117:     [{monitor_nodes, [],
  118:       [monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason,
  119:        monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason,
  120:        monitor_nodes_node_type, monitor_nodes_misc,
  121:        monitor_nodes_otp_6481, monitor_nodes_errors,
  122:        monitor_nodes_combinations, monitor_nodes_cleanup,
  123:        monitor_nodes_many,
  124:        monitor_nodes_down_up]},
  125:      {differing_cookies, [],
  126:       [differing_cookies,
  127:        cmdline_setcookie_2,
  128:        connection_cookie,
  129:        dyn_differing_cookies,
  130:        xdg_cookie]}].
  131: 
  132: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  133:     start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  134:     Config.
  135: 
  136: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  137:     [slave:stop(N) || N <- nodes()],
  138:     kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: end_per_group(monitor_nodes, Config) ->
  145:     %% we disconnect existing nodes because they interfere
  146:     %% with other tests where `nodes() == []` but it wasn't.
  147:     ok = kill_existing_nodes(),
  148:     Config;
  149: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC == hostnames;
  153:                                    TC == nodenames ->
  154:     file:make_dir("hostnames_nodedir"),
  155:     file:write_file("hostnames_nodedir/ignore_core_files",""),
  156:     Config;
  157: init_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, Config) ->
  158:     [] = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -relaxed_command_check -daemon"),
  159:     Config;
  160: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
  161:     Config.
  162: 
  163: end_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, _Config) ->
  164:     os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  165:     ok;
  166: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: connect_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  171:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(node()),
  172:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: tick(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     run_dist_configs(fun tick/2, Config).
  177: 
  178: tick(DCfg, Config) ->
  179:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, false).
  180: 
  181: tick_intensity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  182:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_intensity/2, Config).
  183: 
  184: tick_intensity(DCfg, Config) ->
  185:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, true).
  186: 
  187: tick_test(DCfg, _Config, CheckIntensityArg) ->
  188:     %%
  189:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  190:     %% global wont interfere...
  191:     %%
  192: 
  193:     [Name1, Name2] = get_nodenames(2, dist_test),
  194: 
  195:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1),
  196: 
  197:     case CheckIntensityArg of
  198:         true ->
  199:             %% Not for intensity test...
  200:             ok;
  201:         false ->
  202:             %% First check that the normal case is OK!
  203:             rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [node(), 8000, 16000]),
  204: 
  205:             erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  206:             receive
  207:                 {nodedown, Node} ->
  208:                     ct:fail("nodedown from other node")
  209:             after 30000 ->
  210:                     erlang:monitor_node(Node, false)
  211:             end,
  212:             ok
  213:     end,
  214: 
  215:     stop_node(Node),
  216: 
  217:     %% Now, set the net_ticktime for the other node to 12 secs.
  218:     %% After the sleep(2sec) and cast the other node shall destroy
  219:     %% the connection as it has not received anything on the connection.
  220:     %% The nodedown message should arrive within 8 < T < 16 secs.
  221: 
  222:     %% We must have two slave nodes as the slave mechanism otherwise
  223:     %% halts the client node after tick timeout (the connection is down
  224:     %% and the slave node decides to halt !!
  225: 
  226:     %% Set the ticktime on the server node to 100 secs so the server
  227:     %% node doesn't tick the client node within the interval ...
  228: 
  229:     {ok, ServNode} = start_node(DCfg, Name2,
  230: 				"-kernel net_ticktime 100 -connect_all false"),
  231:     rpc:call(ServNode, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test, [Node, node()]),
  232: 
  233:     %% We set min/max a second lower/higher than expected since it takes
  234:     %% time for termination of the dist controller, delivery of messages,
  235:     %% scheduling of the process receiving nodedown, etc...
  236:     {IArg, Min, Max} = case CheckIntensityArg of
  237:                            false ->
  238:                                {"", 7000, 17000};
  239:                            true ->
  240:                                {" -kernel net_tickintensity 24", 10500, 13500}
  241:                        end,
  242:     
  243:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1,
  244:                             "-kernel net_ticktime 12 -connect_all false" ++ IArg),
  245: 
  246:     rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [ServNode, Min, Max]),
  247: 
  248:     spawn_link(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [Node]),
  249: 
  250:     {tick_serv, ServNode} ! {i_want_the_result, self()},
  251: 
  252:     monitor_node(ServNode, true),
  253:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  254: 
  255:     receive
  256: 	{tick_test, T} when is_integer(T) ->
  257: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  258: 	    stop_node(Node),
  259:             io:format("Result: ~p~n", [T]),
  260: 	    T;
  261: 	{tick_test, Error} ->
  262: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  263: 	    stop_node(Node),
  264: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  265: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  266: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  267: 	    ct:fail("client node died");
  268: 	{nodedown, ServNode} ->
  269: 	    stop_node(Node),
  270: 	    ct:fail("server node died")
  271:     end,
  272:     ok.
  273: 
  274: %% Checks that pinging nonexistyent nodes does not waste space in distribution table.
  275: table_waste(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  276:     run_dist_configs(fun table_waste/2, Config).
  277: 
  278: table_waste(DCfg, _Config) ->
  279:     {ok, HName} = inet:gethostname(),
  280:     F = fun(0,_F) -> [];
  281: 	   (N,F) -> 
  282: 		Name = list_to_atom("erl_distribution_"++integer_to_list(N)++
  283: 					"@"++HName),
  284: 		pang = net_adm:ping(Name),
  285: 		F(N-1,F)
  286: 	end,
  287:     F(256,F),
  288:     {ok, N} = start_node(DCfg, erl_distribution_300),
  289:     stop_node(N),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal name part works, and that illegal
  293: %% ones are filtered
  294: nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  295:     legal("a1@b"),
  296:     legal("a-1@b"),
  297:     legal("a_1@b"),
  298: 
  299:     %% Test that giving two -sname works as it should
  300:     started = test_node("a_1@b", false, long_or_short() ++ "a_0@b"),
  301: 
  302:     illegal("cdé@a"),
  303:     illegal("te欢st@a").
  304: 
  305: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal host part works, and that illegal
  306: %% ones are filtered
  307: hostnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  308:     Host = gethostname(),
  309:     legal([$a,$@|atom_to_list(Host)]),
  310:     legal("1@b1"),
  311:     legal("b@b1-c"),
  312:     legal("c@b1_c"),
  313:     legal("d@b1#c"),
  314:     legal("f@::1"),
  315:     legal("g@1:bc3:4e3f:f20:0:1"),
  316: 
  317:     case file:native_name_encoding() of
  318:         latin1 -> ignore;
  319:         _ -> legal("e@b1é")
  320:     end,
  321:     long_hostnames(net_kernel:longnames()),
  322: 
  323:     illegal("h@testالع"),
  324:     illegal("i@языtest"),
  325:     illegal("j@te欢st").
  326: 
  327: long_hostnames(true) ->
  328:     legal("k@b.b.c"),
  329:     legal("l@b.b-c.d"),
  330:     legal("m@b.b_c.d"),
  331:     legal("n@127.0.0.1"),
  332:     legal("o@207.123.456.789");
  333: long_hostnames(false) ->
  334:     illegal("k@b.b.c").
  335: 
  336: legal(Name) ->
  337:     case test_node(Name) of
  338:         started ->
  339:             ok;
  340:         not_started ->
  341:             ct:fail("no ~p node started", [Name])
  342:     end.
  343: 
  344: illegal(Name) ->
  345:     case test_node(Name, true) of
  346:         not_started ->
  347:             ok;
  348:         started ->
  349:             ct:fail("~p node started with illegal name", [Name])
  350:     end.
  351: 
  352: test_node(Name) ->
  353:     test_node(Name, false).
  354: test_node(Name, Illegal) ->
  355:     test_node(Name, Illegal, "").
  356: test_node(Name, Illegal, ExtraArgs) ->
  357:     ProgName = ct:get_progname(),
  358:     Command = ProgName ++ " -noinput " ++
  359:         long_or_short() ++ Name ++ ExtraArgs ++
  360:         " -eval \"net_adm:ping('" ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ "')\"" ++
  361:         case Illegal of
  362:             true ->
  363:                 " -eval \"timer:sleep(10000),init:stop().\"";
  364:             false ->
  365:                 ""
  366:         end,
  367:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  368:     BinCommand = unicode:characters_to_binary(Command, utf8),
  369:     _Prt = open_port({spawn, BinCommand}, [stream,{cd,"hostnames_nodedir"}]),
  370:     Node = list_to_atom(Name),
  371:     receive
  372:         {nodeup, Node} ->
  373:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  374:             slave:stop(Node),
  375:             started
  376:     after 5000 ->
  377:         net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  378:         not_started
  379:     end.
  380: 
  381: long_or_short() ->
  382:     case net_kernel:longnames() of
  383:         true -> " -name ";
  384:         false -> " -sname "
  385:     end.
  386: 
  387: % get the localhost's name, depending on the using name policy
  388: gethostname() ->
  389:     Hostname = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  390:        true->
  391:            net_adm:localhost();
  392:        _->
  393:            {ok, Name}=inet:gethostname(),
  394:            Name
  395:     end,
  396:     list_to_atom(Hostname).
  397: 
  398: %% Test that pinging an illegal nodename does not kill the node.
  399: illegal_nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     run_dist_configs(fun illegal_nodenames/2, Config).
  401: 
  402: illegal_nodenames(DCfg, _Config) ->
  403:     {ok, Node}=start_node(DCfg, illegal_nodenames),
  404:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  405:     RPid=rpc:call(Node, erlang, spawn,
  406: 		  [?MODULE, pinger, [self()]]),
  407:     receive
  408: 	{RPid, pinged} ->
  409:             monitor_node(Node, false),
  410: 	    ok;
  411: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  412: 	    ct:fail("Remote node died.")
  413:     end,
  414:     stop_node(Node),
  415:     ok.
  416: 
  417: pinger(Starter) ->
  418:     io:format("Starter:~p~n",[Starter]),
  419:     net_adm:ping(a@b@c),
  420:     Starter ! {self(), pinged},
  421:     ok.
  422: 
  423: 
  424: %% Test that you can set the net_setuptime properly.
  425: net_setuptime(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  426:     run_dist_configs(fun net_setuptime/2, Config).
  427: 
  428: net_setuptime(DCfg, _Config) ->
  429: 
  430:     %% In this test case, we reluctantly accept shorter times than the given
  431:     %% setup time, because the connection attempt can end in a
  432:     %% "Host unreachable" error before the timeout fires.
  433: 
  434:     Res0 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "2"),
  435:     io:format("Res0 = ~p", [Res0]),
  436:     true = (Res0 =< 4000),
  437:     Res1 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "0.3"),
  438:     io:format("Res1 = ~p", [Res1]),
  439:     true = (Res1 =< 500),
  440:     ok.
  441: 
  442: do_test_setuptime(DCfg, Setuptime) when is_list(Setuptime) ->
  443:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, dist_setuptime_test,
  444:                             "-kernel net_setuptime " ++ Setuptime),
  445:     Res = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,time_ping,[?DUMMY_NODE]),
  446:     stop_node(Node),
  447:     Res.
  448: 
  449: time_ping(Node) ->
  450:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  451:     pang = net_adm:ping(Node),
  452:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  453:     erlang:convert_time_unit(T1 - T0, native, millisecond).
  454: 
  455: %% Keep the connection with the client node up.
  456: %% This is necessary as the client node runs with much shorter
  457: %% tick time !!
  458: keep_conn(Node) ->
  459:     sleep(1),
  460:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, time, []),
  461:     keep_conn(Node).
  462: 
  463: tick_serv_test(Node, MasterNode) ->
  464:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [MasterNode]),
  465:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test1, [Node]).
  466: 
  467: tick_serv_test1(Node) ->
  468:     register(tick_serv, self()),
  469:     TestServer = receive {i_want_the_result, TS} -> TS end,
  470:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  471:     receive
  472: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  473: 	    net_adm:ping(Node), %% Set up the connection again !!
  474: 
  475: 	    {tick_test, Node} ! {whats_the_result, self()},
  476: 	    receive
  477: 		{tick_test, Res} ->
  478: 		    TestServer ! {tick_test, Res}
  479: 	    end
  480:     end.
  481: 
  482: tick_cli_test(Node, Min, Max) ->
  483:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test1, [Node, Min, Max]).
  484: 
  485: tick_cli_test1(Node, Min, Max) ->
  486:     register(tick_test, self()),
  487:     erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  488:     sleep(2),
  489:     rpc:call(Node, erlang, time, []), %% simulate action on the connection
  490:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  491:     receive
  492: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  493: 	    T2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  494: 	    receive
  495: 		{whats_the_result, From} ->
  496: 		    Diff = erlang:convert_time_unit(T2-T1, native,
  497: 						    millisecond),
  498: 		    case Diff of
  499: 			T when Min =< T, T =< Max ->
  500: 			    From ! {tick_test, T};
  501: 			T ->
  502: 			    From ! {tick_test,
  503: 				    {"T not in interval "
  504:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Min)
  505:                                      ++ " =< T =< "
  506:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Max),
  507: 				     T}}
  508: 		    end
  509: 	    end
  510:     end.
  511: 
  512: epmd_reconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  513:     NodeNames = [N1,N2,N3] = get_nodenames(3, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  514:     Nodes = [atom_to_list(full_node_name(NN)) || NN <- NodeNames],
  515: 
  516:     DCfg = "-epmd_port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT,
  517: 
  518:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  519: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1" | Nodes]),
  520:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  521: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2" | Nodes]),
  522:     {_N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  523: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "3" | Nodes]),
  524:     Ports = [Port1, Port2, Port3],
  525: 
  526:     ok = reap_ports(Ports),
  527:    
  528:     ok.
  529: 
  530: reap_ports([]) ->
  531:     ok;
  532: reap_ports(Ports) ->
  533:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  534: 	{Port, Message} ->
  535:             case lists:member(Port, Ports) andalso Message of
  536:                 {data,String} ->
  537:                     io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  538:                     reap_ports(Ports);
  539:                 {exit_status,0} ->
  540:                     reap_ports(Ports -- [Port])
  541:             end
  542:     end.
  543:     
  544: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["1", Node1, Node2, Node3]) ->
  545:     Names = [Name || Name <- [hd(string:tokens(Node, "@")) || Node <- [Node1, Node2, Node3]]],
  546:     %% wait until all nodes are registered
  547:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  548:     "Killed" ++_ = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  549:     open_port({spawn, ?ALT_EPMD_CMD}, []),
  550:     %% check that all nodes reregister with epmd
  551:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  552:     lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  553:                           ANode = list_to_atom(Node),
  554:                           pong = net_adm:ping(ANode),
  555:                           {epmd_reconnect_do, ANode} ! {stop, Node1, Node}
  556:                   end, [Node2, Node3]),
  557:     ok;
  558: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["2", Node1, Node2, _Node3]) ->
  559:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  560:     receive {stop, Node1, Node2} ->
  561:             ok
  562:     after 7000 ->
  563:             exit(timeout)
  564:     end;
  565: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["3", Node1, _Node2, Node3]) ->
  566:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  567:     receive {stop, Node1, Node3} ->
  568:             ok
  569:     after 7000 ->
  570:             exit(timeout)
  571:     end.
  572: 
  573: wait_for_names(Names) ->
  574:     %% wait for up to 3 seconds (the current retry timer in erl_epmd is 2s)
  575:     wait_for_names(lists:sort(Names), 30, 100).
  576: 
  577: wait_for_names(Names, N, Wait) when N > 0 ->
  578:     try
  579:         {ok, Info} = erl_epmd:names(),
  580:         Names = lists:sort([Name || {Name, _Port} <- Info]),
  581:         ok
  582:     catch
  583:         error:{badmatch, _} ->
  584:             timer:sleep(Wait),
  585:             wait_for_names(Names, N-1, Wait)
  586:     end.
  587: 
  588: 
  589: dyn_node_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  590:     run_dist_configs(fun dyn_node_name/2, Config).
  591: 
  592: dyn_node_name(DCfg, _Config) ->
  593:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:get_state() of
  594:                      #{name_domain := shortnames} -> "shortnames";
  595:                      #{name_domain := longnames} -> "longnames"
  596:                  end,
  597:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg,
  598:                                           undefined, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  599:                                           ["dyn_node_name_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  600:                                            NameDomain]),
  601:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  602:     ok.
  603: 
  604: dyn_node_name_do(TestNode, [NameDomainStr]) ->
  605:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  606:     [] = nodes(),
  607:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  608:     NameDomain = list_to_atom(NameDomainStr),
  609:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  610:      name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  611:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type,all}]),
  612:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  613:     [] = nodes(),
  614:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  615:     MyName = node(),
  616:     false = (MyName =:= undefined),
  617:     false = (MyName =:= nonode@nohost),
  618:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  619:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  620:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  621: 
  622:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  623:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  624: 
  625:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(TestNode),
  626: 
  627:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  628:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  629: 
  630:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  631:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  632:     NodedownMsgA1 = receive_any(),
  633:     NodedownMsgA2 = receive_any(),
  634:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([NodedownMsgA1, NodedownMsgA2]),
  635: 
  636:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  637:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  638:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  639:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  640: 
  641:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  642:     [] = nodes(),
  643:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  644:     MyName = node(),
  645:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  646:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  647: 
  648:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  649: 
  650:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  651:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  652: 
  653:     true = rpc:cast(TestNode, net_kernel, disconnect, [MyName]),
  654: 
  655:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  656:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  657: 
  658:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  659:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  660:     NodedownMsgB1 = receive_any(),
  661:     NodedownMsgB2 = receive_any(),
  662:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([NodedownMsgB1, NodedownMsgB2]),
  663: 
  664:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  665:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  666:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  667:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  668:     ok.
  669: 
  670: check(X, X) -> ok.
  671: 
  672: setopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  673:     run_dist_configs(fun setopts/2, Config).
  674: 
  675: setopts(DCfg, _Config) ->
  676:     register(setopts_regname, self()),
  677:     [N1,N2,N3,N4,N5] = get_nodenames(5, setopts),
  678: 
  679:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  680: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1", "ping"]),
  681:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  682: 
  683:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  684: 				 ["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2", "ping"]),
  685:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port2),
  686: 
  687:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{packet,2}, {active,false}]),
  688:     {ok, LTcpPort} = inet:port(LSock),
  689: 
  690:     {N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  691: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  692: 					 "1", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  693:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N3F, Port3),
  694:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port3),
  695: 
  696:     {N4F,Port4} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N4, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  697: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  698: 					 "2", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  699:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N4F, Port4),
  700:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port4),
  701: 
  702:     %% net_kernel:setopts(new, _) used to be able to produce a deadlock
  703:     %% in net_kernel. GH-6129/OTP-18198
  704:     {N5F,Port5} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N5, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  705: 					["setopts_deadlock_test", atom_to_list(node()),
  706: 					 integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  707:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N5F, Port5),
  708:     repeat(fun () ->
  709:                    receive after 10 -> ok end,
  710:                    erlang:disconnect_node(N5F),
  711:                    WD = spawn_link(fun () ->
  712:                                            receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  713:                                            exit({net_kernel_probably_deadlocked, N5F})
  714:                                    end),
  715:                    pong = net_adm:ping(N5F),
  716:                    unlink(WD),
  717:                    exit(WD, kill),
  718:                    false = is_process_alive(WD)
  719:            end,
  720:            200),
  721:     try
  722:         erpc:call(N5F, erlang, halt, [])
  723:     catch
  724:         error:{erpc,noconnection} -> ok
  725:     end,
  726:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port5),
  727: 
  728:     unregister(setopts_regname),
  729:     ok.
  730: 
  731: wait_and_connect(LSock, NodeName, NodePort) ->
  732:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  733:     {ok, "Connect please"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  734:     flush_from_port(NodePort),
  735:     pong = net_adm:ping(NodeName),
  736:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect done"),
  737:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  738: 
  739: 
  740: flush_from_port(Port) ->
  741:     flush_from_port(Port, 10).
  742: 
  743: flush_from_port(Port, Timeout) ->
  744:     receive
  745: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  746: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  747: 	    flush_from_port(Port, Timeout)
  748:     after Timeout ->
  749: 	    timeout
  750:     end.
  751: 
  752: wait_for_port_exit(Port) ->
  753:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  754: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} ->
  755: 	    Status;
  756: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  757: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  758: 	    wait_for_port_exit(Port)
  759:     end.
  760: 
  761: run_remote_test([FuncStr, TestNodeStr | Args]) ->
  762:     Status = try
  763: 	io:format("Node ~p started~n", [node()]),
  764: 	TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNodeStr),
  765: 	io:format("Node ~p spawning function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  766: 	{Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, list_to_atom(FuncStr), [TestNode, Args]),
  767: 	io:format("Node ~p waiting for function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  768: 	receive
  769: 	    {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, normal} ->
  770: 		0;
  771: 	    Other ->
  772: 		io:format("Node ~p got unexpected msg: ~p\n",[node(), Other]),
  773: 		1
  774: 	end
  775:     catch
  776: 	C:E:S ->
  777: 	    io:format("Node ~p got EXCEPTION ~p:~p\nat ~p\n",
  778: 		      [node(), C, E, S]),
  779: 	    2
  780:     end,
  781:     io:format("Node ~p doing halt(~p).\n",[node(), Status]),
  782:     erlang:halt(Status).
  783: 
  784: % Do the actual test on the remote node
  785: setopts_do(TestNode, [OptNr, ConnectData]) ->
  786:     [] = nodes(),
  787:     {Opt, Val} = opt_from_nr(OptNr),
  788:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{Opt, Val}]),
  789: 
  790:     [] = nodes(),
  791:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  792: 
  793:     case ConnectData of
  794: 	"ping" ->  % We connect
  795: 	    net_adm:ping(TestNode);
  796: 	TcpPort -> % Other connect
  797: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  798: 					 [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  799: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  800: 	    {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  801: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock)
  802:     end,
  803:     [TestNode] = nodes(),
  804:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  805:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts('pixie@fairyland', [Opt]),
  806: 
  807:     NewVal = change_val(Val),
  808:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, NewVal}]),
  809:     {ok, [{Opt,NewVal}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  810: 
  811:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, Val}]),
  812:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  813: 
  814:     ok.
  815: 
  816: setopts_deadlock_test(_TestNode, [TcpPort]) ->
  817:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  818:                                  [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  819:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  820:     {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  821:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  822:     setopts_new_loop().
  823:     
  824: setopts_new_loop() ->
  825:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{nodelay, true}]),
  826:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
  827:     setopts_new_loop().
  828:     
  829: opt_from_nr("1") -> {nodelay, true};
  830: opt_from_nr("2") -> {nodelay, false}.
  831: 
  832: change_val(true)  -> false;
  833: change_val(false) -> true.
  834: 
  835: 
  836: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  837:     start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, erlang:get_cookie(), Mod, Func, Args).
  838: 
  839: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  840:     FullName = full_node_name(Name),
  841:     CmdLine =
  842:         mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args),
  843:     io:format("Starting node ~p: ~s~n", [FullName, CmdLine]),
  844:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, [exit_status]) of
  845: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
  846: 	    {FullName, Port};
  847: 	Error ->
  848: 	    exit({failed_to_start_node, FullName, Error})
  849:     end.
  850: 
  851: full_node_name(PreName) when is_atom(PreName) ->
  852:     full_node_name(atom_to_list(PreName));
  853: full_node_name(PreNameL) when is_list(PreNameL) ->
  854:     HostSuffix = lists:dropwhile(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
  855: 				 atom_to_list(node())),
  856:     list_to_atom(PreNameL ++ HostSuffix).
  857: 
  858: mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  859:     Static = "-noinput",
  860:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  861:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
  862: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
  863: 	       _ -> exit(no_progname_argument_found)
  864: 	   end,
  865:     NameSw = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  866: 		 false -> "-sname ";
  867: 		 true -> "-name ";
  868: 		 _ -> exit(not_distributed_node)
  869: 	     end,
  870:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  871:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
  872:     Prog ++ " "
  873: 	++ Static ++ " "
  874: 	++ NameSw ++ " " ++ NameStr
  875:         ++ " " ++ DCfg
  876: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
  877: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
  878: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(Cookie)
  879: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(Mod) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(Func)
  880: 	++ " " ++ string:join(Args, " ").
  881: 
  882: 
  883: %% OTP-4255.
  884: tick_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  885:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_change/2, Config).
  886: 
  887: tick_change(DCfg, _Config) ->
  888:     %%
  889:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  890:     %% global wont interfere...
  891:     %%
  892:     [BN, CN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  893:     DefaultTT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
  894:     unchanged = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 60),
  895:     case DefaultTT of
  896: 	I when is_integer(I) -> ok;
  897: 	_                 -> ct:fail(DefaultTT)
  898:     end,
  899: 
  900:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  901:     case nodes(connected) of
  902: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(10, 0);
  903: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  904: 			    set_net_ticktime, [10, 5])
  905:     end,
  906: 
  907:     wait_until(fun () -> 10 == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  908:     {ok, B} = start_node(DCfg, BN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -connect_all false"),
  909:     {ok, C} = start_node(DCfg, CN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -hidden"),
  910: 
  911:     OTE = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  912:     case catch begin
  913: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 10, 1),
  914: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 1, 10)
  915: 	       end of
  916: 	{'EXIT', Reason} ->
  917: 	    stop_node(B),
  918: 	    stop_node(C),
  919: 	    %% In case other nodes are connected
  920: 	    case nodes(connected) of
  921: 		[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  922: 		_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  923: 				    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 10])
  924: 	    end,
  925: 	    wait_until(fun () ->
  926: 			       DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()
  927: 		       end),
  928: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  929: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  930: 	_ ->
  931: 	    ok
  932:     end,
  933:     process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  934:     stop_node(B),
  935:     stop_node(C),
  936: 
  937:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  938:     case nodes(connected) of
  939: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  940: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  941: 			    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 5])
  942:     end,
  943: 
  944:     wait_until(fun () -> DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  945:     ok.
  946: 
  947: 
  948: wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref) ->
  949:     receive
  950: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  951: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{node(), {nodedown, Node}}]),
  952: 	    Tester ! {Ref, {node(), {nodedown, Node}}}
  953:     end,
  954:     wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref).
  955: 
  956: run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, PrevTT, TT) ->
  957:     [DN, EN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  958: 
  959:     Tester = self(),
  960:     Ref = make_ref(),
  961:     MonitorNodes = fun (Nodes) ->
  962: 			   lists:foreach(
  963: 			     fun (N) ->
  964: 				     monitor_node(N,true)
  965: 			     end,
  966: 			     Nodes),
  967: 			   wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref)
  968: 		   end,
  969: 
  970:     {ok, D} = start_node(DCfg, DN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  971: 			 ++ integer_to_list(PrevTT)),
  972: 
  973:     NMA = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([B, C, D]) end),
  974:     NMB = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), C, D]) end),
  975:     NMC = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, D]) end),
  976: 
  977:     MaxTT = case PrevTT > TT of
  978: 		true  -> PrevTT;
  979: 		false -> TT
  980: 	    end,
  981: 
  982:     CheckResult = make_ref(),
  983:     spawn_link(fun () ->
  984: 		       receive
  985: 		       after (25 + MaxTT)*1000 ->
  986: 			       Tester ! CheckResult
  987: 		       end
  988: 	       end),
  989: 
  990:     %% In case other nodes than these are connected
  991:     case nodes(connected) -- [B, C, D] of
  992: 	[] -> ok;
  993: 	OtherNodes -> rpc:multicall(OtherNodes, net_kernel,
  994: 				    set_net_ticktime, [TT, 20])
  995:     end,
  996: 
  997:     change_initiated = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  998:     {ongoing_change_to,_} = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  999:     sleep(3),
 1000:     change_initiated = rpc:call(B,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,15]),
 1001:     sleep(7),
 1002:     change_initiated = rpc:call(C,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,10]),
 1003: 
 1004:     {ok, E} = start_node(DCfg, EN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
 1005: 			 ++ integer_to_list(TT)),
 1006:     NME  = spawn_link(E, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, C, D]) end),
 1007:     NMA2 = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1008:     NMB2 = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1009:     NMC2 = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1010: 
 1011:     receive CheckResult -> ok end,
 1012: 
 1013:     unlink(NMA),  exit(NMA, kill),
 1014:     unlink(NMB),  exit(NMB, kill),
 1015:     unlink(NMC),  exit(NMC, kill),
 1016:     unlink(NME),  exit(NME, kill),
 1017:     unlink(NMA2), exit(NMA2, kill),
 1018:     unlink(NMB2), exit(NMB2, kill),
 1019:     unlink(NMC2), exit(NMC2, kill),
 1020: 
 1021:     %% The node not changing ticktime should have been disconnected from the
 1022:     %% other nodes
 1023:     receive {Ref, {Node, {nodedown, D}}} when Node == node() -> ok
 1024:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1025:     end,
 1026:     receive {Ref, {B, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1027:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1028:     end,
 1029:     receive {Ref, {C, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1030:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1031:     end,
 1032:     receive {Ref, {E, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1033:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1034:     end,
 1035: 
 1036:     %% No other connections should have been broken
 1037:     receive
 1038: 	{Ref, Reason} ->
 1039: 	    stop_node(E),
 1040: 	    exit({?LINE, Reason});
 1041: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when Pid == NMA;
 1042: 				   Pid == NMB;
 1043: 				   Pid == NMC;
 1044: 				   Pid == NME;
 1045: 				   Pid == NMA2;
 1046: 				   Pid == NMB2;
 1047: 				   Pid == NMC2 ->
 1048: 	    stop_node(E),
 1049: 
 1050: 	    exit({?LINE, {node(Pid), Reason}})
 1051:     after 0 ->
 1052: 	    TT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1053: 	    TT = rpc:call(B, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1054: 	    TT = rpc:call(C, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1055: 	    TT = rpc:call(E, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1056: 	    stop_node(E),
 1057: 	    ok
 1058:     end.
 1059: 
 1060: %%
 1061: %% Basic tests of hidden node.
 1062: %%
 1063: %% Basic test of hidden node.
 1064: hidden_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1065:     run_dist_configs(fun hidden_node/2, Config).
 1066: 
 1067: hidden_node(DCfg, Config) ->
 1068:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden", Config),
 1069:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden -hidden", Config),
 1070:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden true -hidden true", Config),
 1071:     ok.
 1072: 
 1073: hidden_node(DCfg, HArgs, _Config) ->
 1074:     ct:pal("--- Hidden argument(s): ~s~n", [HArgs]),
 1075:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1076:     VMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(V),
 1077:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1078:     %% Connect visible_node -> hidden_node
 1079:     connect_nodes(V, H),
 1080:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1081:     stop_node(H),
 1082:     sleep(5),
 1083:     check_monitor_nodes_res(VMN, H),
 1084:     stop_node(V),
 1085:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1086:     HMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(H),
 1087:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1088:     %% Connect hidden_node -> visible_node
 1089:     connect_nodes(H, V),
 1090:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1091:     stop_node(V),
 1092:     sleep(5),
 1093:     check_monitor_nodes_res(HMN, V),
 1094:     stop_node(H),
 1095:     ok.
 1096: 
 1097: connect_nodes(A, B) ->
 1098:     %% Check that they haven't already connected.
 1099:     false = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1100:     false = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1101:     %% Connect them.
 1102:     pong = rpc:call(A, net_adm, ping, [B]).
 1103: 
 1104: 
 1105: test_nodes(V, H) ->
 1106:     %% No nodes should be visible on hidden_node
 1107:     [] = rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, []),
 1108:     %% visible_node should be hidden on hidden_node
 1109:     true = lists:member(V, rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
 1110:     %% hidden_node node shouldn't be visible on visible_node
 1111:     false = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1112:     %% hidden_node should be hidden on visible_node
 1113:     true = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [hidden])).
 1114: 
 1115: mn_loop(MNs) ->
 1116:     receive
 1117: 	{nodeup, N} ->
 1118: 	    mn_loop([{nodeup, N}|MNs]);
 1119: 	{nodedown, N} ->
 1120: 	    mn_loop([{nodedown, N}|MNs]);
 1121: 	{monitor_nodes_result, Ref, From} ->
 1122: 	    From ! {Ref, MNs};
 1123: 	_ ->
 1124: 	    mn_loop(MNs)
 1125:     end.
 1126: 
 1127: start_monitor_nodes_proc(Node) ->
 1128:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1129:     Starter = self(),
 1130:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1131: 		fun() ->
 1132: 			net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1133: 			Starter ! Ref,
 1134: 			mn_loop([])
 1135: 		end),
 1136:     receive
 1137: 	Ref ->
 1138: 	    ok
 1139:     end,
 1140:     Pid.
 1141: 
 1142: 
 1143: check_monitor_nodes_res(Pid, Node) ->
 1144:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1145:     Pid ! {monitor_nodes_result, Ref, self()},
 1146:     receive
 1147: 	{Ref, MNs} ->
 1148: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, MNs)
 1149:     end.
 1150: 
 1151: 
 1152: 
 1153: %% Check the kernel inet_dist_{listen,connect}_options options.
 1154: inet_dist_options_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1155:     Prio = 1,
 1156:     case gen_udp:open(0, [{priority,Prio}]) of
 1157: 	{ok,Socket} ->
 1158: 	    case inet:getopts(Socket, [priority]) of
 1159: 		{ok,[{priority,Prio}]} ->
 1160: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1161: 		    do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio);
 1162: 		_ ->
 1163: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1164: 		    {skip,
 1165: 		     "Can not set priority "++integer_to_list(Prio)++
 1166: 			 " on socket"}
 1167: 	    end;
 1168: 	{error,_} ->
 1169: 	    {skip, "Can not set priority on socket"}
 1170:     end.
 1171: 
 1172: do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio) ->
 1173:     PriorityString0 = "[{priority,"++integer_to_list(Prio)++"}]",
 1174:     PriorityString =
 1175: 	case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1176: 	    "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1177: 		PriorityString0;
 1178: 	    _ ->
 1179: 		%% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1180: 		"'"++PriorityString0++"'"
 1181: 	end,
 1182:     InetDistOptions =
 1183: 	"-hidden "
 1184: 	"-kernel inet_dist_connect_options "++PriorityString++" "
 1185: 	"-kernel inet_dist_listen_options "++PriorityString,
 1186:     {ok,Node1} =
 1187: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1188:     {ok,Node2} =
 1189: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1190:     %%
 1191:     pong =
 1192: 	rpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1193:     PrioritiesNode1 =
 1194: 	rpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1195:     PrioritiesNode2 =
 1196: 	rpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1197:     io:format("PrioritiesNode1 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode1]),
 1198:     io:format("PrioritiesNode2 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode2]),
 1199:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode1, P =:= Prio],
 1200:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode2, P =:= Prio],
 1201:     [_|_] = Elevated,
 1202:     %%
 1203:     stop_node(Node2),
 1204:     stop_node(Node1),
 1205:     ok.
 1206: 
 1207: get_socket_priorities() ->
 1208:     [Priority ||
 1209: 	{ok,[{priority,Priority}]} <-
 1210: 	    [inet:getopts(Port, [priority]) ||
 1211: 		Port <- erlang:ports(),
 1212: 		element(2, erlang:port_info(Port, name)) =:= "tcp_inet"]].
 1213: 
 1214: 
 1215: 
 1216: %% check net_ticker_spawn_options
 1217: net_ticker_spawn_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1218:     run_dist_configs(fun net_ticker_spawn_options/2, Config).
 1219: 
 1220: net_ticker_spawn_options(DCfg, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1221:     FullsweepString0 = "[{fullsweep_after,0}]",
 1222:     FullsweepString =
 1223:         case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1224:             "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1225:                 FullsweepString0;
 1226:             _ ->
 1227:                 %% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1228:                 "'"++FullsweepString0++"'"
 1229:         end,
 1230:     InetDistOptions =
 1231:         "-hidden "
 1232:         "-kernel net_ticker_spawn_options "++FullsweepString,
 1233:     {ok,Node1} =
 1234:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1235:     {ok,Node2} =
 1236:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1237:     %%
 1238:     pong =
 1239:         erpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1240:     FullsweepOptionNode1 =
 1241:         erpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node2]),
 1242:     FullsweepOptionNode2 =
 1243:         erpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node1]),
 1244:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode1 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode1]),
 1245:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode2 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode2]),
 1246:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode1,
 1247:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode2,
 1248:     %%
 1249:     stop_node(Node2),
 1250:     stop_node(Node1),
 1251:     ok.
 1252: 
 1253: get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option(Node) ->
 1254:     Links = case proplists:get_value(Node, erlang:system_info(dist_ctrl)) of
 1255:                 DistCtrl when is_port(DistCtrl) ->
 1256:                     {links, Ls} = erlang:port_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1257:                     Ls;
 1258:                 DistCtrl when is_pid(DistCtrl) ->
 1259:                     {links, Ls} = process_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1260:                     Ls
 1261:             end,
 1262:     Ticker = try
 1263:                  lists:foreach(
 1264:                    fun (Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1265:                            {current_stacktrace, Stk}
 1266:                                = process_info(Pid, current_stacktrace),
 1267:                            lists:foreach(
 1268:                              fun ({dist_util, con_loop, _, _}) ->
 1269:                                      throw(Pid);
 1270:                                  (_) ->
 1271:                                      ok
 1272:                              end, Stk);
 1273:                        (_) ->
 1274:                            ok
 1275:                    end, Links),
 1276:                  error(no_ticker_found)
 1277:              catch
 1278:                  throw:Pid when is_pid(Pid) -> Pid
 1279:              end,
 1280:     {garbage_collection, GCOpts} = erlang:process_info(Ticker, garbage_collection),
 1281:     proplists:get_value(fullsweep_after, GCOpts).
 1282: 
 1283: 
 1284: 
 1285: %%
 1286: %% Testcase:
 1287: %%   monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason
 1288: %%
 1289: 
 1290: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1291:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1292: 
 1293: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1294:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1295:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1296:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1297: 
 1298:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(5, node),
 1299:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5] = Names,
 1300: 
 1301:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1, "-connect_all false"),
 1302:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-connect_all false"),
 1303:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-connect_all false"),
 1304:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1305: 
 1306:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1307:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1308:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1309: 
 1310:     receive {nodeup, N1, []} -> ok end,
 1311:     receive {nodeup, N2, []} -> ok end,
 1312:     receive {nodeup, N3, []} -> ok end,
 1313: 
 1314:     stop_node(N1),
 1315:     stop_node(N4),
 1316:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(N2),
 1317:     TickTime = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1318:     SleepTime = TickTime + (TickTime div 2),
 1319:     spawn(N3, fun () ->
 1320: 		      block_emu(SleepTime*1000),
 1321: 		      halt()
 1322: 	      end),
 1323: 
 1324:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1325:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1326:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1327: 
 1328:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{nodedown_reason, R1}]} -> connection_closed = R1 end,
 1329:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{nodedown_reason, R2}]} -> disconnect = R2 end,
 1330:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{nodedown_reason, R3}]} -> net_tick_timeout = R3 end,
 1331: 
 1332:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1333: 
 1334:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1335:     stop_node(N5),
 1336: 
 1337:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1338:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1339:     print_my_messages(),
 1340:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1341:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1342:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1343:     ok.
 1344: 
 1345: 
 1346: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1347:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1348: 
 1349: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1350:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1351:     Me = self(),
 1352:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1353:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason),
 1354:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, ""),
 1355:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1356: 		fun() ->
 1357: 			Me ! {stuff,
 1358: 			      self(),
 1359: 			      [make_ref(),
 1360: 			       {processes(), erlang:ports()}]}
 1361: 		end),
 1362:     receive {nodeup, Node, []} -> ok end,
 1363:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1364:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1365:     ComplexTerm = receive {stuff, Pid, _} = Msg ->
 1366: 			  {Msg, term_to_binary(Msg)}
 1367: 		  end,
 1368:     exit(Owner, ComplexTerm),
 1369:     receive
 1370: 	{nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, NodeDownReason}]} ->
 1371: 	    ok
 1372:     end,
 1373:     %% If the complex nodedown_reason messed something up garbage collections
 1374:     %% are likely to dump core
 1375:     garbage_collect(),
 1376:     garbage_collect(),
 1377:     garbage_collect(),
 1378:     ComplexTerm = NodeDownReason,
 1379:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1380:     no_msgs(),
 1381:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1382:     ok.
 1383: 
 1384:

 1390: %%
 1391: 
 1392: monitor_nodes_node_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1393:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_node_type/2, Config).
 1394: 
 1395: monitor_nodes_node_type(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1396:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1397:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1398:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}]),
 1399:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(9, node),
 1400:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5, NN6, NN7, NN8, NN9] = Names,
 1401: 
 1402:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1403:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2),
 1404:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-hidden"),
 1405:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1406: 
 1407:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1408:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1409: 
 1410:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1411:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1412:     receive {nodeup, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1413:     receive {nodeup, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1414: 
 1415:     stop_node(N1),
 1416:     stop_node(N2),
 1417:     stop_node(N3),
 1418:     stop_node(N4),
 1419: 
 1420:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1421:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1422: 
 1423:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1424:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1425:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1426:     receive {nodedown, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1427: 
 1428:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}]),
 1429:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1430: 
 1431:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1432:     stop_node(N5),
 1433:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1434: 
 1435:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1436:     {ok, N6} = start_node(DCfg, NN6),
 1437:     {ok, N7} = start_node(DCfg, NN7, "-hidden"),
 1438: 
 1439: 
 1440:     receive {nodeup, N6} -> ok end,
 1441:     receive {nodeup, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1442:     stop_node(N6),
 1443:     stop_node(N7),
 1444: 
 1445:     receive {nodedown, N6} -> ok end,
 1446:     receive {nodedown, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1447: 
 1448:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1449:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1450:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1451: 
 1452:     {ok, N8} = start_node(DCfg, NN8),
 1453:     {ok, N9} = start_node(DCfg, NN9, "-hidden"),
 1454: 
 1455:     receive {nodeup, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1456:     stop_node(N8),
 1457:     stop_node(N9),
 1458: 
 1459:     receive {nodedown, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1460:     print_my_messages(),
 1461:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1462:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1463:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1464:     ok.
