 1467: %%
 1468: %% Testcase:
 1469: %%   monitor_nodes
 1470: %%
 1471: 
 1472: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1473:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1474: 
 1475: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1476:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1477:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1478:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1479:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1480:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1481:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1482:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1483:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1484: 
 1485:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1486:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1487: 
 1488:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1489: 
 1490:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1491:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1492:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1493:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1494: 
 1495:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1496: 
 1497:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1498:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1499: 
 1500:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1501:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1502: 
 1503:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1504:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1505: 
 1506:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1507:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1508: 
 1509:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1510:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1511: 
 1512:     stop_node(N1),
 1513:     stop_node(N2),
 1514: 
 1515:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1516: 
 1517:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1518:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1519:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1520:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1521:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1522:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1523:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1524:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1525:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1526:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1527: 
 1528:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1529:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1530:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1531:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1532:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1533:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1534:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1535:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1536:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1537:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1538: 
 1539:     receive
 1540:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1541:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1542:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1543:                     receive
 1544:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1545:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1546:                     end;
 1547:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1548:                     receive
 1549:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1550:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1551:                     end
 1552:             end
 1553:     end,
 1554:     receive
 1555:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1556:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1557:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1558:                     receive
 1559:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1560:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1561:                     end;
 1562:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1563:                     receive
 1564:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1565:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1566:                     end
 1567:             end
 1568:     end,
 1569: 
 1570:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1571:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1572:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1573:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1574: 
 1575:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1576:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1577:     stop_node(N3),
 1578:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1579:     print_my_messages(),
 1580:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1581:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1582:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1583:     ok.
 1584: 
 1585: 
 1586: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1587: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1588: %% received after messages from Node.
 1589: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1590:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1591: 
 1592: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1593:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1594:     ok = monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1595:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1596:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1597:     ok = monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1598:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1599:     ok.
 1600: 
 1601: kill_existing_nodes() ->
 1602:     kill_existing_nodes(nodes()),
 1603:     ok.
 1604: 
 1605: kill_existing_nodes([]) -> ok;
 1606: kill_existing_nodes([Node | Nodes]) ->
 1607:     catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 1608:     kill_existing_nodes(Nodes).
 1609: 
 1610: 
 1611: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1612:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1613:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1614:     Me = self(),
 1615:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1616:     case TestType of
 1617: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1618: 	nodeup -> ok
 1619:     end,
 1620:     Seq = lists:seq(1,10000),
 1621:     MN = spawn_link(
 1622: 	   fun () ->
 1623: 		   lists:foreach(
 1624: 		     fun (_) ->
 1625: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1626: 		     end,
 1627: 		     Seq),
 1628: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1629: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1630: 	   end),
 1631:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1632:     case TestType of
 1633: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1634: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1635:     end,
 1636: 
 1637:     %% Whitebox:
 1638:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1639:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1640:     %%                on nodedown.
 1641:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1642:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1643:     %%                on nodeup
 1644: 
 1645:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1646:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1647:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1648:     TestMonNodeState =
 1649: 	case TestType of
 1650: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1651: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1652: 	end
 1653: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1654: 	++ case TestType of
 1655: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1656: 	       nodeup -> []
 1657: 	   end
 1658: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1659: 
 1660:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1661:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1662: 
 1663:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1664: 		      fun () ->
 1665: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1666: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1667: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1668: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1669: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1670: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1671: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1672: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1673: 			      halt()
 1674: 		      end),
 1675: 
 1676:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1677:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1678: 
 1679:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1680:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1681:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1682:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1683:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1684:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1685: 
 1686:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1687:     %% message.
 1688:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1689:     no_msgs(500),
 1690: 
 1691:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1692:     unlink(MN),
 1693:     exit(MN, bang),
 1694:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1695:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1696:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1697:     ok.
 1698: 
 1699: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1700:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1701: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1702: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1703: 	OtherMsg ->
 1704: 	    OtherMsg
 1705:     end.
 1706: 
 1707: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1708:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1709:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1710: 
 1711: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1712:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1713:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1714:     {error,
 1715:      {unknown_options,
 1716:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1717: 					   [gurka]),
 1718:     {error,
 1719:      {unknown_options,
 1720:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1721:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1722:     {error,
 1723:      {invalid_options,
 1724:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1725: 					 gurka),
 1726:     {error,
 1727:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1728:       [{node_type,visible},
 1729:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1730: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1731: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1732: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1733:     {error,
 1734:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1735:       [{node_type,visible},
 1736:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1737: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1738: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1739: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1740:     {error,
 1741:      {bad_option_value,
 1742:       {node_type,
 1743:        blaha}}}
 1744: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1745:     {error,
 1746:      {bad_option_value,
 1747:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1748: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1749:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1750:     ok.
 1751: 
 1752: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1753:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1754: 
 1755: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1756:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1757:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1758:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1759: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1760:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1761:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1762:     no_msgs(),
 1763:     stop_node(Visible),
 1764:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1765:     no_msgs(),
 1766:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1767:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1768:     no_msgs(),
 1769:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1770:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1771:     no_msgs(),
 1772:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1773:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1774:     no_msgs(),
 1775:     ok.
 1776: 
 1777: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1778:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1779:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1780: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1781:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1782: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1783:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1784: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1785:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1786: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1787:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1788: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1789: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1790:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1791: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1792: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1793:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1794: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1795: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1796:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1797:     8.
 1798: 
 1799: 
 1800: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1801:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1802:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1803: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1804: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1805:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1806:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1807:     ok;
 1808: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1809:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1810:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1811:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1812:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1813:     ok.
 1814: 
 1815: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1816:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1817:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1818:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1819:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1820:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1821: 
 1822: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1823:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1824:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1825: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1826: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1827: 						   Node,
 1828: 						   Reason),
 1829:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1830:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1831:     ok;
 1832: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1833:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1834:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1835:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1836:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1837:     ok.
 1838: 
 1839: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1840:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1841:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1842:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1843:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1844:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1845:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1846: 
 1847: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1848:     ok;
 1849: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1850:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1851:     receive
 1852: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1853: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1854: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1855: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1856: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1857: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1858: 	    end;
 1859: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1860: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1861: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1862: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1863: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1864: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1865: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1866: 	    end;
 1867: 	Msg ->
 1868: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1869: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1870: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1871:     end.
 1872: 
 1873: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1874:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1875:     Me = self(),
 1876:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1877:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1878: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1879: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1880: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1881: 		end),
 1882:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1883: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1884: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1885: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1886: 	       end),
 1887:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1888:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1889:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1890:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1891:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1892:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1893:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1894:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1895:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1896:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1897:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1898:     no_msgs(),
 1899:     ok.
 1900: 
 1901: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1902:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1903: 
 1904: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1905:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1906:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1907:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1908:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1909:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1910:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1911:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1912:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1913:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1914:     stop_node(Node),
 1915:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1916:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1917:     no_msgs(10),
 1918:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1919:     ok.
 1920: 
 1921: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1922: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1923:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1924:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1925:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1926:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1927: 
 1928: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1929:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1930:     Papa = self(),
 1931: 
 1932:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1933:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1934:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1935:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1936:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1937:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1938:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1939:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1940:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1941:                                      F()
 1942:                              end,
 1943:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1944:                 ||
 1945:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1946: 
 1947:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1948:     %% as quick as possible.
 1949:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1950:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1951:                                    F()
 1952:                            end,
 1953:                            [link, monitor]),
 1954: 
 1955:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1956:     Yoyos = 20,
 1957:     [begin
 1958:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1959:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1960: 
 1961:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1962:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1963: 
 1964:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1965:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1966:      end
 1967:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1968: 
 1969:     unlink(Spammer),
 1970:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1971:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1972: 
 1973:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1974:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1975: 
 1976:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1977:     ok.
 1978: 
 1979: receive_any() ->
 1980:     receive_any(infinity).
 1981: 
 1982: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1983:     receive
 1984:         M -> M
 1985:     after
 1986:         Timeout -> timeout
 1987:     end.
 1988: 
 1989: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1990:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1991:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1992:         Pid -> Pid
 1993:     end.
 1994: 
 1995: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1996:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1997:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1998:     Owner.
 1999: 
 2000: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2001:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 2002: 
 2003: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2004:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 2005:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 2006:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 2007:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2008:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 2009:               end, ToReject).
 2010: 
 2011: combinations([H | T]) ->
 2012:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 2013: combinations([]) ->
 2014:     [0];
 2015: combinations(BitField) ->
 2016:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 2017: 
 2018: bits(0, _) ->
 2019:     [];
 2020: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2021:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2022: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2023:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2024: 
 2025: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2026:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2027: 
 2028: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2029:     ThisNode = node(),
 2030:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2031:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2032:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2033:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2034:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2035:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2036:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2037:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2038:                end),
 2039:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2040:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2041:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2042:                end),
 2043:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2044:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2045:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2046:                end),
 2047: 
 2048:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2049:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2050: 
 2051:     stop_node(Node1),
 2052:     stop_node(Node2),
 2053:     ok.
 2054: 
 2055: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2056:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2057:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2058:     %% the connection a bit...
 2059:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2060:     try
 2061:         lists:foreach(
 2062:           fun (P) ->
 2063:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2064:                       undefined ->
 2065:                           ok;
 2066:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2067:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2068:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2069:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2070:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2071:                                             (_) ->
 2072:                                                 ok
 2073:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2074:                   end
 2075:           end, Ps),
 2076:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2077:     catch
 2078:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2079:     end,
 2080:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2081:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2082:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2083:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2084:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2085:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2086:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2087:                            end),
 2088:     R = make_ref(),
 2089:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2090:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2091: 
 2092:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2093:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2094:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2095:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2096: 
 2097:     unlink(Pid),
 2098:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2099:     ok.
 2100: 
 2101: 
 2102: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2103:     case os:type() of
 2104:         {win32,_} ->
 2105:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2106:         _ ->
 2107:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2108:     end.
 2109: 
 2110: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2111:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2112:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2113:                                end,
 2114:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2115:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2116:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2117:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2118:     receive
 2119:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2120:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2121:     end,
 2122:     receive
 2123:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2124:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2125:     end,
 2126:     
 2127:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2128:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2129:     receive
 2130:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2131:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2132:             pong = PingRes
 2133:     end,
 2134: 
 2135:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2136:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2137:     receive
 2138:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2139:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2140:             [Node2] = N1List
 2141:     end,
 2142: 
 2143:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2144:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2145:     receive
 2146:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2147:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2148:             [Node1] = N2List
 2149:     end,
 2150: 
 2151:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2152: 
 2153:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2154:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2155: 
 2156:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2157:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2158: 
 2159:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2160:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2161: 
 2162:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2163: 
 2164:     ok.
 2165: 
 2166: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2167: 
 2168: uds_listen() ->
 2169:     Me = self(),
 2170:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2171:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2172:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2173:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2174:                        end)}.
 2175: 
 2176: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2177:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2178:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2179:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2180:                    end),
 2181:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2182: 
 2183: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2184:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2185:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2186:         {error, Reason} ->
 2187:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2188:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2189:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2190:     end.
 2191: 
 2192: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2193:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2194:         nonode@nohost ->
 2195:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2196:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2197:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2198:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2199:             register(Node, self()),
 2200:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2201:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2202:     end.
 2203: 
 2204: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2205:     receive
 2206:         {From, close} ->
 2207:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2208:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2209:             exit(normal);
 2210:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2211:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2212:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2213:     end.
 2214: 
 2215: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2216:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2217:         {error, Reason} ->
 2218:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2219:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2220:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2221:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2222:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2223:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2224:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2225:                 close ->
 2226:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2227:                     exit(normal);
 2228:                 Other ->
 2229:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2230:             end
 2231:     end,
 2232:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2233: 
 2234: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2235:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2236:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2237:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2238:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2239:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2240:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2241:                                end),
 2242:     receive
 2243:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2244:             if Reason == normal ->
 2245:                     halt();
 2246:                true ->
 2247:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2248:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2249:                     halt(EStr)
 2250:             end
 2251:     end.
 2252: 
 2253: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2254:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2255:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2256:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2257: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2258: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2259: 	   end,
 2260:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2261:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2262:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2263: 	++ Static
 2264: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2265: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2266: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2267: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2268:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2269:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2270:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2271:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2272: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2273: 	    unlink(Port),
 2274: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2275: 	Error ->
 2276: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2277:     end,
 2278:     ok.
 2279: 
 2280: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2281:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2282:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2283: 
 2284: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2285:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2286:     register(MyName, self()),
 2287:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2288:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2289:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2290:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2291: 
 2292: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2293:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2294:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2295:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2296:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2297:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2298:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2299:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2300:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2301: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2302:             case DistListen == false of
 2303:                 false ->
 2304:                     ok;
 2305:                 true ->
 2306:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2307:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2308:                     ok
 2309:             end,
 2310:             receive
 2311:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2312:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2313:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2314:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2315:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2316:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2317:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2318:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2319:                     TestNode = Node,
 2320:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2321:                         true ->
 2322:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2323:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2324:                         false ->
 2325:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2326:                     end,
 2327:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2328:                         true ->
 2329:                             true = IsHidden,
 2330:                             false = IsVisible;
 2331:                         false ->
 2332:                             false = IsHidden,
 2333:                             true = IsVisible
 2334:                     end
 2335:             end,
 2336:             ok;
 2337: 	Error ->
 2338: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2339:     end.
 2340: 
 2341: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2342:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2343:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2344: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2345: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2346: 	   end,
 2347:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2348:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2349:                      true -> "longnames"
 2350:                  end,
 2351:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2352:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2353:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2354: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2355: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2356: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2357: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2358:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2359:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2360:                true ->
 2361:                    "";
 2362:                false ->
 2363:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2364:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2365:            end
 2366:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2367:                true -> "";
 2368:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2369:            end
 2370:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2371:                true -> "";
 2372:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2373:            end.
 2374: 
 2375: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2376:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2377:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2378: 
 2379: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2380:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2381:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2382:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2383:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2384:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2385:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2386:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2387: 
 2388: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2389:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2390:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2391:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2392:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2393:                 true -> ok
 2394:             end,
 2395:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2396:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2397:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2398:             erlang:halt();
 2399:         Error ->
 2400:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2401:     end.
 2402: 
 2403: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2404:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2405:     Node = node(),
 2406:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2407:     [] = nodes(),
 2408:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2409: 
 2410:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2411: 
 2412:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2413:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2414:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2415:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2416:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2417:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2418:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2419:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2420:     try
 2421: 
 2422:         %% Verify the cluster
 2423:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2424:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2425: 
 2426:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2427:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2428:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2429:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2430:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2431:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2432:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2433:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2434:         try
 2435: 
 2436:             %% Verify the cluster
 2437:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2438:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2439:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2440: 
 2441:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2442:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2443:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2444:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2445: 
 2446:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2447:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2448:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2449: 
 2450:             %% Verify the cluster
 2451:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2452:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2453:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2454:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2455:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2456:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2457:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2458: 
 2459:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2460:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2461: 
 2462:             %% Verify the cluster
 2463:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2464:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2465:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2466: 
 2467:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2468:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2469: 
 2470:             %% Verify the cluster
 2471:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2472:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2473:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2474:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2475:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2476: 
 2477:         after
 2478:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2479:         end
 2480:     after
 2481:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2482:     end,
 2483:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2484:     ok.
 2485: 
 2486: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2487:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2488:     Node = node(),
 2489:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2490:     [] = nodes(),
 2491:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2492:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2493:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2494:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2495: 
 2496:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2497: 
 2498:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2499:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2500:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2501:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2502:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2503:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2504:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2505:         start_node(
 2506:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2507:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2508: 
 2509:     try
 2510: 
 2511:         %% Verify the cluster
 2512:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2513:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2514:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2515: 
 2516:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2517: 
 2518:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2519:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2520:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2521:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2522:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2523:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2524:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2525:             start_node(
 2526:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2527:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2528:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2529:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2530: 
 2531:         try
 2532: 
 2533:             %% Verify the cluster
 2534:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2535:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2536:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2537:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2538:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2539: 
 2540:             %% Connect the nodes
 2541:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2542: 
 2543:             %% Verify the cluster
 2544:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2545:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2546:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2547:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2548:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2549:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2550:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2551: 
 2552:         after
 2553:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2554:         end
 2555:     after
 2556:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2557:     end,
 2558:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2559:     ok.
 2560: 
 2561: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2562:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2563:     Node = node(),
 2564:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2565:     [] = nodes(),
 2566:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2567:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2568: 
 2569:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2570:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2571:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2572:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2573:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2574:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2575:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2576:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2577:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2578:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2579:         start_node(
 2580:           "", NodeAName,
 2581:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2582:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2583: 
 2584:     try
 2585: 
 2586:         %% Verify the cluster
 2587:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2588:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2589:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2590:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2591:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2592: 
 2593:     after
 2594:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2595:     end,
 2596:     [] = nodes(),
 2597:     ok.
 2598: 
 2599: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2600:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2601:     MotherNode = node(),
 2602:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2603:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2604:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2605:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2606:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2607:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2608:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2609: 
 2610:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2611:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2612:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2613:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2614:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2615:         start_node_unconnected(
 2616:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2617:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2618:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2619:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2620: 
 2621:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2622: 
 2623:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2624:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2625:         start_node_unconnected(
 2626:           "",
 2627:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2628:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2629:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2630: 
 2631:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2632: 
 2633: 
 2634: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2635:     receive
 2636:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2637:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2638:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2639:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2640:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2641:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2642:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2643:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2644: 
 2645:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2646: 
 2647:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2648:             ok;
 2649:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2650:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2651:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2652:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2653:         Other ->
 2654:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2655:     end.
 2656: 
 2657: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2658:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2659:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2660:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2661:     case SetCookie of
 2662:         "set_cookie" ->
 2663:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2664:         "cmdline" ->
 2665:             ok
 2666:     end,
 2667:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2668:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2669:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2670:     DynNode = node(),
 2671:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2672:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2673:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2674:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2675:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2676:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2677:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2678:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2679:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2680:     receive
 2681:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2682:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2683:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2684:             ok;
 2685:         Other ->
 2686:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2687:     end.
 2688: 
 2689: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2690:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2691: 
 2692:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2693:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2694: 
 2695:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2696:               {win32, _} ->
 2697:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2698:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2699:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2700:               _ ->
 2701:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2702:           end,
 2703: 
 2704:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2705:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2706:                   connection => 0 },
 2707: 
 2708:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2709:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2710:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2711:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2712:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2713:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2714:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2715: 
 2716:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2717:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2718:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2719:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2720:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2721:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2722: 
 2723:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2724: 
 2725:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2726: 
 2727:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2728: 
 2729:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2730:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2731:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2732:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2733:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2734:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2735:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2736: 
 2737:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2738: 
 2739:     ok.
 2740: 
 2741: allowed(_Config) ->
 2742:     %% inspired by differing_cookies/1
 2743:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2744:     NodeT = node(),
 2745:     true = NodeT =/= nonode@nohost,
 2746:     [] = nodes(),
 2747:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2748: 
 2749:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2750: 
 2751:     %% Start node A
 2752:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2753:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2754:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2755:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName),
 2756: 
 2757:     %% allow NodeT on NodeA so that other connections are dismissed
 2758:     {ok,[]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2759:     ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeT]]),
 2760:     {ok,[NodeT]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2761:     try
 2762: 
 2763:         %% Verify the cluster
 2764:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2765:         [ NodeT ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2766: 
 2767:         %% Start node B
 2768:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2769:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2770:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2771:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName),
 2772: 
 2773:         try
 2774: 
 2775:             %% Verify the cluster
 2776:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2777:             [ NodeT ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2778:             [ NodeT ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2779: 
 2780:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect as A does not allow B.
 2781:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2782:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2783: 
 2784:             %% Allow node B on node A
 2785:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]]),
 2786:             {ok,N_B} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2787:             equal_sets([NodeT,NodeB], N_B),
 2788:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2789: 
 2790:             %% Verify the cluster
 2791:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2792:             equal_sets( [NodeT, NodeB],
 2793:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2794:             equal_sets( [NodeT, NodeA],
 2795:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2796: 
 2797:             %% Disconnect and connect the other way (B -> A)
 2798:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2799:             [NodeT] = rpc:call( NodeA, ?MODULE, wait_node_down, [NodeB] ),
 2800:             [NodeT] = rpc:call( NodeB, ?MODULE, wait_node_down, [NodeA] ),
 2801:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2802: 
 2803:             %% Verify the cluster
 2804:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2805:             equal_sets( [NodeT, NodeB],
 2806:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2807:             equal_sets( [NodeT, NodeA],
 2808:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2809: 
 2810:             %% Disallow node A on node B (by allowing node T)
 2811:             %% and verify it does not affect the existing connection
 2812:             ok = rpc:call(NodeB, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeT]]),
 2813:             {ok,[NodeT]} = rpc:call(NodeB, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2814:             equal_sets([NodeT, NodeA],
 2815:                        rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2816: 
 2817:             %% Disconnect and fail to reconnect
 2818:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2819:             [NodeT] = rpc:call( NodeA, ?MODULE, wait_node_down, [NodeB] ),
 2820:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2821:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2822: 
 2823:             %% Allow node T again and verify its only returned once.
 2824:             ok = rpc:call(NodeB, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeT]]),
 2825:             {ok,[NodeT]} = rpc:call(NodeB, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2826: 
 2827:             %% Test non-registered process
 2828:             %% 'net_kernel' is registered to a process
 2829:             %% so we unregister it to test the output 'ignored'
 2830:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, erts_internal, dynamic_node_name, [false]),
 2831:             true = rpc:call(NodeA, erlang, unregister, [net_kernel]),
 2832:             ignored = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]])
 2833:         after
 2834:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2835:         end
 2836:     after
 2837:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2838:     end,
 2839:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2840:     ok.
 2841: 
 2842: wait_node_down(Node) ->
 2843:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [all]),
 2844:     Timeout = case lists:member(Node, nodes(connected)) of
 2845:                  true -> 10_000;
 2846:                  false -> 0
 2847:              end,
 2848:     receive
 2849:         {nodedown, Node} -> ok
 2850:     after
 2851:         Timeout -> ok
 2852:     end,
 2853:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [all]),
 2854:     nodes(connected).
 2855: 
 2856: %% Misc. functions
 2857: 
 2858: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2859:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2860:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2861:         S ->
 2862:             ok;
 2863:         _ ->
 2864:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2865:     end.
 2866: 
 2867: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2868:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2869:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2870:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2871:                          default ->
 2872:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2873:                          size ->
 2874:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2875:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2876:                      end,
 2877:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2878:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2879:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2880:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2881:               end,
 2882:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2883: 
 2884: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2885:     Me = self(),
 2886:     Go = make_ref(),
 2887:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2888:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2889:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2890:                                    Me ! Go,
 2891:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2892:                            end),
 2893:     receive
 2894:         Go ->
 2895:             ok;
 2896:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2897:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2898:     end.
 2899: 
 2900: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2901:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2902:         undefined ->
 2903:             ok;
 2904:         Pid ->
 2905:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2906:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2907:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2908:     end.
 2909: 
 2910: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2911:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2912:                0 -> default;
 2913:                1 -> size
 2914:            end,
 2915:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2916: 
 2917: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2918:     receive
 2919:         {From, Ref} ->
 2920:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2921:             NewType = case Type of
 2922:                           default -> size;
 2923:                           size -> default
 2924:                       end,
 2925:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2926:     end.
 2927: 
 2928: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2929:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2930:     try
 2931:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2932:         receive
 2933:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2934:                 Type
 2935:         end
 2936:     catch
 2937:         error:badarg ->
 2938:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2939:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2940:     end.
 2941: 
 2942: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2943:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2944:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2945:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2946:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2947:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2948:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2949:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2950:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2951: 
 2952: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2953:     receive
 2954:         dist_data ->
 2955:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2956:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2957:         _ ->
 2958:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2959:     end,
 2960:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2961: 
 2962: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2963:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2964:         none ->
 2965:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2966:         {Size, Data} ->
 2967:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2968:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2969:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2970:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2971:     end.
 2972: 
 2973: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2974:     ok;
 2975: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2976:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2977: 
 2978: monitor_node_state() ->
 2979:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2980:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2981:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2982:     MonitoringNodes.
 2983: 
 2984: 
 2985: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2986:     receive
 2987: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2988: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2989: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2990: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2991:     after TimeOut ->
 2992: 	    ok
 2993:     end.
 2994: 
 2995: print_my_messages() ->
 2996:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2997:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2998:     ok.
 2999: 
 3000: 
 3001: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 3002: 
 3003: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 3004:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 3005:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 3006: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 3007:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3008:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 3009: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 3010:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3011:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 3012: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 3013:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3014:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 3015: 
 3016: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 3017:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3018:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 3019: 
 3020: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 3021:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 3022: 
 3023: stop_node(Node) ->
 3024:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 3025: 
 3026: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3027:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3028: 
 3029: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3030:     Acc;
 3031: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3032:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3033:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 3034: 					++ "-"
 3035: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3036: 					++ "-"
 3037: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 3038: 
 3039: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3040:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3041: 
 3042: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3043:     Acc;
 3044: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3045:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3046:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3047: 		       ++ "-"
 3048: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3049: 		       ++ "-"
 3050: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 3051:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 3052: 
 3053: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3054:     case Fun() of
 3055: 	true ->
 3056: 	    ok;
 3057: 	_ ->
 3058: 	    receive
 3059: 	    after 100 ->
 3060: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 3061: 	    end
 3062:     end.
 3063: 
 3064: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 3065:     ok;
 3066: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 3067:     Fun(),
 3068:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 3069: 
 3070: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 3071:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 3072: 
 3073: no_msgs() ->
 3074:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 3075: 
 3076: block_emu(Ms) ->
 3077:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3078:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 3079:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 3080:     Res.
 3081: 
 3082:
